title: Commutative Property of Addition
text: The equation can be re-arranged in the form $$3x+x-2y-3y-7$$
speech: The equation can be re-arranged in the form  3 x plus x minus 2 y minus 3 y minus 7
pacedSpeech: The equation can be re-arranged in the form   3 x plus x minus 2 y minus 3 y minus 7

title: Like Terms
text: You can add like terms (terms with the same variable) together.
speech: You can add like terms (terms with the same variable) together.
pacedSpeech: You can add like terms (terms with the same variable) together.

title: Like Terms
speech: , 3 x plus x, is equal to 4 x
pacedSpeech: , 3 x plus x, is equal to 4 x

title: Like Terms
speech: minus 2 y minus 3 y is equal to negative 5 y
pacedSpeech: minus 2 y minus 3 y is equal to negative 5 y
